name: Raid Boss
description:
An MMO raid boss simulator where you take control of every hero in the party. Create your own party of 2 up to 8 characters choosing from 4 different classes! Each hero class has its own identity defined by its base stats and five unique spells. Command your heroes in this real-time strategy environment and defeat the fearsome raid boss!

For more information about the game controls, hero spells or boss fight mechanics, visit the in-game main menu About page.

We have only managed to create a single raid boss and we are aware of the lack of content this game offers. If you have any ideas of how this game could grow, please let us know in the comments, we have enjoyed creating this one very much and hope to keep developing it more in the future. Every suggestion, bug report or other feedback is very appreciated! ♥
